# Description

I'm interested in helping researchers to achieve openness, transparency, and equity in their research and publishing journey. I have experience with preregistrations, registered reports, and software development for open publishing (ResearchEquals.com).

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Nami Sunami"
special_skill <- "pop culture references"

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "open source software", "open access", "data management",  all_of(special_skill), "data sharing", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
